casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Robert CUADRADO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017

Justine F. Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Elizabeth S. Tanaka, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 901, 171 A.3d 118 (2017), is denied.
